decision_points.label: Accessory Coverage Policy
decision_points.description: Determines how aftermarket accessories are treated in coverage decisions

options.label: Included If Declared
options.description: Cover accessories only if explicitly declared on the policy at inception or renewal

options.label: Included By Default
options.description: Always cover aftermarket accessories regardless of declaration status

options.label: Excluded
options.description: Never cover aftermarket accessories under the base policy

decision_points.label: Deductible Waiver Eligibility
decision_points.description: Determines when the standard deductible may be waived

options.label: Never Waive
options.description: Standard deductible always applies regardless of circumstances

options.label: Waive If Not At Fault
options.description: Waive deductible when the insured is not at fault for the incident

options.label: Waive First Claim
options.description: Waive deductible for the first claim in the policy period

decision_points.label: Total Loss Determination
decision_points.description: Threshold for declaring a vehicle a total loss

options.label: Repair Exceeds 70%
options.description: Declare total loss when repair cost exceeds 70% of vehicle value

options.label: Repair Exceeds 80%
options.description: Declare total loss when repair cost exceeds 80% of vehicle value
